meanings.definition: A type of grass with bluish stems
meanings.sent1: The bluestem swayed gently in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use bluestem to feed their livestock.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used bluestem to tickle its friends.
meanings.sent4: The bluestem stood tall like a soldier in the field.
meanings.sent5: The bluestem looked like a river of blue in the meadow.

meanings.sent1: The bluestem added a touch of color to the garden.
meanings.sent2: The bluestem plant grew rapidly in the fertile soil.
meanings.sent3: The curious rabbit nibbled on the bluestem for a snack.
meanings.sent4: The bluestem plant reached for the sky like a ladder.
meanings.sent5: The bluestem plant danced in the wind like a graceful ballerina.

meanings.definition: A bluish stem of a plant
meanings.sent1: The bluestem of the flower was a beautiful shade of blue.
meanings.sent2: She carefully examined the bluestem of the plant.
meanings.sent3: The bluestem of the tree was jealous of the green leaves.
meanings.sent4: The bluestem of the rose was delicate and elegant.
meanings.sent5: The bluestem of the bush shimmered in the sunlight.
